sentence.text: I am convinced that many students often do not understand what is being said in teaching situations , though they become adept at pretending to , as they do not wish to lose face .
However , Mr Kelman is convinced that a law against hacking for fun will hamper the investigation and prosecution of computer crime .
I am convinced that it should be the goal of every concerned person to share in that task of educating people to think and behave ecologically .
It was only later that he found out that nearly everyone suffers from the same delusion in one form or another ; at the time he was convinced that it was his own personal idiosyncrasy .
Thus , for example , I am not convinced that Satan is a centre of pure malicious but rational evil .
Nora had no intention of having any more children and she was convinced that she and Constance would be better off alone .
Anyone who wants the Ring does so because they are convinced that they could use it in order to destroy Darkness .
Benskins increased his rent by Â£6,000 last year and John is convinced they must have known then that leases policy .
Endill was convinced he would wake everyone up .
However , he is convinced the watch was there already .
Cryptosporidium was diagnosed three weeks ago , but doctors are convinced it 's now died off and Julie 's current problems are the result of something else .
Fratter 's ( 1989 ) study indicates that provided practitioners are convinced about the importance of contact , adoptive families may not be too difficult to find .
Not all bankers are convinced of the need to change .
He became convinced of the future of floodlit football , and on arriving back at Highbury gave poor Bob Wall just one month to get hold of ` lanterns " for the practice ground .
All three were convinced of his innocence .
In short , I became convinced of my own omnipotence .
He quickly became convinced of the need for political action and founded a branch of the Ulster Protestant Volunteers .
Because he was convinced Zack was about to scuttle and run , if he could n't get to Zack alone and unarmed , without a shadow from either the British or American authorities . "
Eventually her mother became convinced cannabis could help after reading evidence from doctors in the United States .
I 'm not convinced .
She brings home everything except potatoes and anyone who says that one ca n't get fresh vegetables in London must do her shopping by telephone , she is convinced .
Many of the new arrivals , who waited in the street outside the embassy , said they were convinced there would be another train for them .
I 'm convinced this is the answer for growing tender plants in Spartan conditions .
" I have looked into this case with some care , and I am not convinced that you are on the right lines .
